```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
census_api_key("ab8b0fa7ef0993c579097beb76d0321bce5af443", install = TRUE)
```
```{r}
var<-load_variables(2020,"acs5")
View(var)
```

```{r}
emp_stat_disability <-("Employed with disability"= "C18120_004")
emp_stat_no_disability <- ("Employed with no disability"= "C18120_005")
```
```{r}
empl_status_table <- get_acs(
  geography= "state",
  year = 2020,
  variables = emp_stat_disability,
  state= "IA"
)
View(empl_status_table)
```
